page.title: 04Lyminge shops
page.content: Here is a list of the shops: 2 butchers, V G Stores, chemist, Lyminge Fashions, greengrocers, Post Office, 2 house agents, Mace Stores, stationers, newsagents, baker, hairdresser, hardware, off-licence, fish & chips, cafe. Station Road has the most shops, it has nine. Canterbury Road has four, Mayfield has three and the High Street has two. We did a survey of which shops people in our class used the most. VG was the most popular, closely followed by the newsagents. Next came the Post Office, all the rest people did not go to much. We decided to compare the prices of canned drinks. VG and Mace were the cheapest at 20p. The fish and chip shop came next, closely followed by the off-licence and newsagents at 25p. The most expensive was the cafe at 28p.
